metadata.job_to_be_done: Create and manage fillable forms for onboarding and compliance

subsection_analysis.refined_text: The Ultimate PDF Sharing Checklist will ensure you cover all the bases with Adobe Acrobat . Share PDFs via email, link, or a third-party app like Microsoft Teams or WhatsApp . Set Permissions, customize your message and customise your message .

Share PDFs with Adobe Acrobat is straightforward and efficient, whether you're working on a general project or managing real estate documents . Follow these checklists to ensure that your sharing process is smooth and professional .

Real Estate Professionals need to share documents efficiently to close deals and keep clients informed . Here's a tailored checklist to help you manage your PDF sharing needs . Follow up as needed and track down who has accessed the document and follow it up .
Test your knowledge about saving, converting, and exporting PDFs . Dive into real-world scenarios and answer intriguing questions . See if you have what it takes to be a true PDF exporting pro .
The Autosave feature is disabled by default in Acrobat . Yes or No: Can you export a PDF to XML format using Acrobat? Can you use the Snapshot tool to copy selected content as an image?

Comments are notes and drawings that communicate ideas or provide feedback for PDFs . In Acrobat Reader, complete commenting tools are available only in PDFs with commenting enabled . Annotations and markup tools don’t appear by default except when you open a PDF in a review .

Use the Add text comment tool to create a box that contains text . You can add comments to Japanese, Chinese, and Korean text with the Text Box tool . Text box remains visible on the document urchan page; it doesn’t close like a pop-up note .

Use the Add text comment tool to type text anywhere on the PDF page . To change the text formatting, double-click the added text comment to select the font, text alignment, and other text formatting you want .

The moment you use @mention in a PDF file, the review mode gets enabled for you . The reviewers get an invitation  with a link to the Document Cloud shared review file . Sharing reviews are the most collaborative form of review because participants can read and reply to the comments of other participants .
You can use the Select text or Markup tools to add markups to your text . Highlight, strikethrough, or underline text can be added using the Markup tool .

In Acrobat for Windows, you can export text edits directly to the Microsoft® Word document that the PDF is based on to revise the source document . To use this feature, you must use PDFMaker in AutoCAD to convert your file from Word to PDF .

Acrobat and Acrobat Reader support XML data signatures that are used to sign data in XML forms . XML digital signatures ensure integrity, authentication, and non-repudiation in documents . XML signatures only have two data verification states, valid and invalid . The invalid state is called when a user alters the XML-signed content .

Signing a component PDF locks the PDF for editing and secures its content . You can sign the PDF Portfolio as a whole to lock the content of all component PDFs simultaneously . The most significant signature appears in a Signature badge in the toolbar .

Adobe LiveCycle Rights Management (ALCRM) servers let you define centralized policies to control access to documents . Use ALCRM servers to set permissions for separate document tasks, for example opening,  editing, and printing .
There are two methods to apply fields: Simple Authoring is loaded by default in most instances . Advanced Authoring can be enabled by clicking the toggle in the upper right corner of the document .

Sign action is assigned by default . Sign action allows the participant to enter field data and sign the agreement . Email is the default authentication method for confirming the identity of each participant . Password authentication can be added to increase security .

This mode provides simplified authoring with the capability of assigning fields to multiple signers . When you select a signer from the right pane and add fields, the fields are assigned to the signer . That means those fields will be available to the signer for filling the information and signing .

You can manage the deployment of Acrobat AI Assistant through the Adobe Admin Console . Once you assign AI Assistant for Acrobat, the users must restart Acrobat to see AI Assistant . You can choose to either select the users to assign or create product profiles .

Your team members receive an email notification when the product is provisioned to their account . They can select the link to launch Acrobat to access AI Assistant for Acrobat . To check your subscription is activated, select Refresh on the AI Assistant .

GenAl Assistant allows users to process up to 10 documents simultaneously, including non-PDF formats . Each document is up to 600 pages and 100MB . Users can switch between documents, with responses consolidated from various sources . Persistent history support is also included to provide continuous access to previous interactions .

Acrobat is the default PDF viewer in Microsoft Teams . You can access the list of meeting transcripts from Acrobat Home in Teams . Each meeting in the list includes information such as name, organizer, date, time, time and duration .

Content is stored for 30 days in an encrypted, siloed, Adobe-controlled environment  with strict access controls . Content is only retained for . purposes that do not include training a Large Language Model (“LLM”) Examples of product improvement include improving the operability of generative AI in Acrobat .

Generative AI features in Acrobat and Acrobat Reader support multiple document types, including PDFs, DOCX, PPTX, TXT, and RTF files . The capabilities improve comprehension and save time across various document types .

Acrobat allows you to send your completed forms to others and securely save them in Adobe Cloud storage . The Fill & Sign tool automatically detects the form fields like text fields, comb fields, checkboxes, and radio buttons .

Fill and Sign PDF Forms 
You can easily fill, sign, and share your documents using Acrobat's Fill & Sign tool. Types 
of PDF forms

Acrobat and Acrobat Reader users can use the Fill & Sign tool to fill in flat forms . The tools are enabled for the current form only . When you create a different form, redo this task to enable the tools .
Using the Edit Object tool, you can save objects into a separate PDF . Export objects to separate PDFs using the Edit object tool . The tool is available in the App Store and App Store's App Store .

Using the Select tool, draw a rectangle, right-click, and select Take a Snapshot . You can use the Snapshot tool to copy all selected content (text, images, or both) to the clipboard . Text and images are copied as an image .

Use the Select tool to copy and paste individual images from a PDF to a new file or a clipboard . Use the Make Select tool in Windows or MacOS to select images before text . Copy and paste images from PDF to clipboard, another application, or file .

You can save your changes to an Adobe PDF or PDF Portfolio in the original PDF or in a copy of the PDF . You can also save individual PDFs to other file formats, including text, XML,  HTML, and Microsoft Word .

You can export a PDF to PostScript for printing and prepress applications . You can also create an EPS file from any PDF for placement or opening in other applications . The options available depend on whether you're converting a document to PS or EPS .

Select content and save it as a Word document, Excel spreadsheet, or comma-separated document . Convert selected content to other formats by exporting a selection . For example, you can save selected content as Word document or Excel spreadsheet .

Check the accuracy of optical character recognition (OCR) output before editing a scanned PDF . Revert to the original document if any issues arise during the editing process . Use the Scan & OCR tool to recognize text, change OCR language and make all pages editable in one go .

The language is set to the default locale, and the other options are disabled . Any  changes to these settings are persisted and are applied when you edit the document . The new text matches the original font in your scanned PDF .
You can add or insert new text into a PDF using any of the fonts installed on the system . The Add text tool intelligently detects the following text properties of text close to the point of click .
Acrobat automatically runs OCR to make the text and images editable . You can correct typos, change fonts and typeface size, adjust alignment, add content, redact and convert documents to PDF forms .

You can add items to a numbered or bulleted list, create list items, convert a paragraph to a list item, and change list types . You can also change font color and add or remove items to the list at all nested levels .

Some PDFMaker settings are common to several or most applications . Some options are unique to a specific application . The following settings appear on the Settings tab available from within most PDFMaker-enabled applications .

In many authoring applications, you can use the Print command to convert your file to PDF . For Microsoft Office documents, the Adobe PDF printer does not include some of  the features that are available from PDFMaker . For example, you cannot create bookmarks and hyperlinks .

The following options appear when you open the PDFMaker settings from within Microsoft or Lotus Notes . Use the most recent version (in this case, version 1.7ADBE-3) to include all the latest features and functionality .

The Advanced Settings button opens the Adobe PDF Settings dialog box . These conversion settings apply to all Acrobat features that create PDFs, such as Acrobat Distiller, PDFMaker, and the Acrobat application itself .

PDFMaker generates PDF mail merges using Auto Send Adobe PDF files by email . If you selected Automatically Send PDF Files By Email, a dialog box appears asking for your email profile . Type the text that you want to appear in the subject line of each email message .

With Acrobat PDFMaker, you can save steps by using a Word mail merge document and a corresponding data file to output mail merges directly to PDF . You can even set up PDFMaker to attach PDFs to email messages generated during the PDF-creation process .
